Articles.Content:
Hello

So I play with several screens and sometimes I like to watch video's beside playing KSP but every time I want to change my video it "quit" KSP so I wanted to ask if you could add a display option -> borderless. Or add a function Pause On Lost Focus.

 

Thank you to read this post,

TheSpacecube

You can change the startup parameters to do this already:

https://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Startup_parameters

Specifically the "-popupwindow" option.

Edited March 13, 2018 by magico13
